MapCell.title: Sleeping Cell
MapCell.description: A small dark room, with nothing but a pile of hay and a bucket. A single door leading outside.

MapCell.title: Dungeon_Hallway
MapCell.description: You are in a hallway leading further forward.

MapCell.title: Dungeon_T_Junction
MapCell.description: You are at a junction, there is a path to your left and to your right.
